description: This node is a placeholder for raw reads from the WGS prep that are being submitted to dbgap, and not to the DCC, to allow for linkages to derived analysis data.

exp_length.description: The number of raw bases or color space calls expected for the read, includes both mate pairs and all technical portions.

sequence_type.description: Specifies whether the dbgap data contains peptide or nucleotide data.

study.description: One of the 3 studies that are part of the iHMP.

subtype.description: The subtype of the seq set.

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.

urls.description: An array of URL from where the file can be obtained, eg a link to dbgap
